author: gerhard
body: ### Summary of the new feature / enhancement Our CI pipeline would benefit from an `arm64` version of the Docker image. Context: https://github.com/dagger/dagger/pull/2942#issuecomment-1218143578 Our current issue when running on Docker for Mac ARM: At this point, I am just wondering if this is feasible - I don't know enough about this area. Thank you! cc @brittandeyoung @nabsul @cdhunt @ganeshkumar5699 @brendandburns ### Proposed technical implementation details (optional) I am assuming that building a Docker image on `arm64` will suffice, but I don't know enough about your Docker build system. While I can see [`arm64` versions of PowerShell in the last release](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.2.6), I don't know how the official Docker image is built: https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-powershell?tab=description
title: Missing arm64 version for Docker image
